title: A Tribute to Helen McCrory | Peaky Blinders
author: Real Scorsese
comment: This is one of the best tributes. Well done
This is a masterpiece! Rest peacefully Helen. Your forever in my heart ❤️
True fans of Pesky Blinders notice the snippets of season six!
True fans of Pesky notice the season six snippets!
description:
My thoughts are with Damian Lewis and his family

To me, Polly Gray, portrayed by Helen McCrory, was, with Tommy Shelby, one of the two most iconic characters. She was charismatic. She was also the only one who could keep the family united.
Thank you for what you brought to the series, Helen.

Helen McCrory,
thank you for Peaky Blinders.
Rest in peace.
